rules_text:
Menace
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: You draw a card and lose 3 life.
Blight {3}{B} [i](You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {3}{B}. If you do, it enters under an opponent’s control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life unless you sacrifice another nonland permanent or discard a card.
